++ Kalas the City of Mist

[Kalas] DRACONIC
        -used to be the ancient iksar home of [Venril Sathir]'s own tribe, but has since been abandoned.
        
        At the time, Sarnak oppressors were doing evil experiments on the iksar there, the corpse pits where they threw thier failures were known to spawn transparent monstrosities. It's said that their spirits became entwined, trapped, and unable to travel to thier respective afterlife, in a multi directional tormenting tug of war. When [Venril Sathir] became of age, it was his great first deed to free his people from his oppressors. 
        
        The book goes on about the glory, and not about how it was done.
